Package org.eclipse.jetty.maven.plugin

Class JettyForker

java.lang.Object
org.eclipse.jetty.util.component.AbstractLifeCycle
org.eclipse.jetty.maven.plugin.AbstractForker
org.eclipse.jetty.maven.plugin.JettyForker
All Implemented Interfaces:
LifeCycle
public class JettyForker extends AbstractForker
JettyForker Uses quickstart to generate a webapp and forks a process to run it.
